name: pridolog
description: PrizmDoc logs support for VS Code
author: Ilya Shestakov

scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd .. && cd browser && npm install && cd ..
scripts.compile: tsc -p client/tsconfig.json && cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -p server/tsconfig.json && cd browser && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.compile:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.watch:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -w -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.compile:browser: cd browser && npm run build && cd ..
